metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33294 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
In elfutils 0.183, an infinite loop was found in the function handle_symtab in readelf.c .Which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.176-1.1ubuntu0.1
libasm1 - 0.176-1.1ubuntu0.1
libdw1 - 0.176-1.1ubuntu0.1
libelf1 - 0.176-1.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1ubuntu0.1').
